description: The 'pincer' motif. Right-pointing isocoles triangle on left, left-pointing isosceles triangle on right, with small part of right line removed in middle

features.description: Is there a lower right tangent? 0 = no, 1 = yes
What is the decoration inside the parts? 0 = none, 1 = vertical lines
Angle of the pincer. 0 = vertical, 1 = outward, 2 = mixed or indeterminate
